====== Median Template ======


===== About =====
''median'' is a [[docs:theme:template:template|template]] that implements a layout that emphasizes readability by:
  * centering the main content
  * with a fixed width (making the length of a line shorter).

It's the default template for all home [[:docs:page:system:item|item pages]] (ie pages without [[docs:page:system:namespace|namespace]])

===== Slot =====

The [[:docs:theme:slot:side_slot|sidebar]] is not shown.
